title: Inner Space Agent
description: An Inner Space Agent provides event handlers for the Inner Space platform

onPlatformPreStartup.description: Fires before Startup, with specific timing depending on the Inner Space platform. The Session platform (inner space session or joe multiboxer session) performs Pre-Startup before the host game/program is able to run code, useful for assigning Virtual Files, etc.

onPlatformStartup.description: Fires when the Inner Space platform is ready and active

onPulse.description: Fires each frame before scripts, the OnFrame LavishScript event, etc.

additionalProperties.description: A custom Agent event handler that can be fired via agent:FireEvent[name]

minimumBuild.description: Minimum supported Build number of Joe Multiboxer or Inner Space

dependencies.description: A set of agents required by this one

version.description: Minimum version number of the required agent

lgui2MainElement.description: A LavishGUI 2 element name, if any, indicating the main GUI for the agent (may be toggled via an agent list, etc)

metadata.description: Metadata to always attach to the Agent, regardless of the Joe Multiboxer/Inner Space platform or the process

eventHandlers.description: So-called 'global' Agent event handlers, which are activated regardless of the Inner Space platform or the process

platforms.description: 'platform' Agent event handlers, which are activated depending on the Inner Space platform

inner space session.description: Agent properties specifically for Inner Space Sessions (a process, usually a game, that has been launched via Inner Space)

lgui2MainElement.description: A LavishGUI 2 element name, if any, indicating the main GUI for the agent (may be toggled via an agent list, etc) specifically for Inner Space Sessions

metadata.description: Metadata to attach to the Agent only in an Inner Space Session

eventHandlers.description: 'platform' Agent event handlers which are activated only in an Inner Space Session

inner space uplink.description: Agent properties specifically for the Inner Space Uplink (main program)

lgui2MainElement.description: A LavishGUI 2 element name, if any, indicating the main GUI for the agent (may be toggled via an agent list, etc) specifically for the Inner Space Uplink

metadata.description: Metadata to attach to the Agent only in the Inner Space Uplink

eventHandlers.description: 'platform' Agent event handlers which are activated only in the Inner Space Uplink

joe multiboxer session.description: Agent properties specifically for Joe Multiboxer Sessions (a process, usually a game, that has been launched via Joe Multiboxer)

lgui2MainElement.description: A LavishGUI 2 element name, if any, indicating the main GUI for the agent (may be toggled via an agent list, etc) specifically for Joe Multiboxer Sessions

metadata.description: Metadata to attach to the Agent only in a Joe Multiboxer Session

eventHandlers.description: 'platform' Agent event handlers which are activated only in a Joe Multiboxer Session

joe multiboxer uplink.description: Agent properties specifically for the Joe Multiboxer Uplink (main program)

lgui2MainElement.description: A LavishGUI 2 element name, if any, indicating the main GUI for the agent (may be toggled via an agent list, etc) specifically for the Joe Multiboxer Uplink

metadata.description: Metadata to attach to the Agent only in the Joe Multiboxer Uplink

eventHandlers.description: 'platform' Agent event handlers which are activated only in the Joe Multiboxer Uplink

additionalProperties.description: Agent properties specifically for a platform other than those named

metadata.description: Metadata to attach to the Agent only in the specified platform (specified by the property name given to this object)

eventHandlers.description: 'platform' Agent event handlers which are activated only in the specified platform (specified by the property name given to this object)

processes.description: Agent properties specifically for the specified process executable name (lower case!) such as 'innerspace.exe' or 'notepad.exe'

metadata.description: Metadata to attach to the Agent depending on the process executable name, such as 'innerspace.exe' or 'notepad.exe'

additionalProperties.description: 'process' Agent event handlers, which are activated depending on the process executable name, such as 'innerspace.exe' or 'notepad.exe'
